Permissions editor dialog in the Ganymede client.

Nested Class Summary
(package private) static class perm_editor.BoolRenderer
          BoolRenderer is a custom TableCellRenderer class used in conjunction with the Ganymede client's perm_editor, to provide a checkbox that can be graphically disabled if a permissions item may not be edited for some reason .
(package private) static class perm_editor.PermEditorModel
          Custom TreeTableModel model for use with the Ganymede client's perm_editor permissions editor dialog.
(package private) static class perm_editor.permEditorTreeRenderer
          Custom tree renderer for the Ganymede client's permissions editor treeTable.
(package private) static class perm_editor.PermRow
          Data-carrying class for the Ganymede client's perm_editor permissions editor dialog.

Constructor Detail

perm_editor

public perm_editor(perm_field permField,
                   boolean enabled,
                   gclient gc,
                   java.awt.Frame parent,
                   java.lang.String DialogTitle)
Constructor

Parameters:
permField - Who do we talk to to get the permissions?
enabled - If false, it will not be possible to edit permissions, will just display
gc - The gclient that connects us to the client-side schema caches
parent - The frame we are attaching this dialog to
DialogTitle - The title for this dialog box

run

run in interface java.lang.Runnable

initRowTree

private javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode initRowTree()
                                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This method will create a tree of row info that will be used to store the permissions values for the base and basefields. It returns a DefaultMutableTreeNode as the root of the tree structure

Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
